MaskingMapplet.XmlData: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?><!DOCTYPE POWERMART SYSTEM "powrmart.dtd"><POWERMART CREATION_DATE="10/25/2017 05:43:33" REPOSITORY_VERSION="184.93"><REPOSITORY ="INPUT" PRECISION ="2000" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="INPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Input Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="IN_DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="date/time" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IN_DOB" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="IN_DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="9"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM(TO_CHAR(IN_DOB))))=0 OR ISNULL(IN_DOB) OR INSTR(TO_CHAR(IN_DOB),'/',1)=0,'11/11/1990',TO_CHAR(IN_DOB))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="IN_DOB_CHAR" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(IN_DOB_CHAR,1,INSTR(IN_DOB_CHAR,'/',1,2))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="VAR_DD_MM" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="6" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="RTRIM(SUBSTR(IN_DOB_CHAR,INSTR(IN_DOB_CHAR,'/',1,2)+1,4))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="VAR_YY" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="4" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(TO_INTEGER(VAR_YY)<1900,TO_CHAR(1900),VAR_YY)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="VAR_YY_MODIFY" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="4" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="CONCAT(VAR_DD_MM,VAR_YY_MODIFY)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="VAR_DD_MM_YY_EXCLU_TS" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="date/time" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_DATE(VAR_DD_MM_YY_EXCLU_TS,'MM/DD/YYYY')" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="VAR_DD_MM_YY_EXCLU_TS_FINAL" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="9"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="date/time" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM(TO_CHAR(IN_DOB))))=0 OR ISNULL(IN_DOB) OR INSTR(TO_CHAR(IN_DOB),'/',1)=0,IN_DOB,VAR_DD_MM_YY_EXCLU_TS_FINAL)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="VAR_DATE_FINAL" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="9"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="date/time" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="VAR_DATE_FINAL"
